title: Most popular gaming related apps in the U.S. 2019 , by audience
summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Million unique visitors in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Million unique visitors 18.74 is found at Month Google Play Games and the minimum is found at EA where Month is 3.04.
The minimum Month EA has got 6.16 times less Million unique visitors than the maximum Month Google Play Games.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Million unique visitors in the y axis.
Month Google Play Games has the highest Million unique visitors and EA has the lowest Million unique visitors.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Million unique visitors in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Million unique visitors 18.74 is found at Month Google Play Games and the minimum is found at EA where Month is 3.04.
The minimum Month EA has got 6.16 times less Million unique visitors than the maximum Month Google Play Games.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Million unique visitors in the y axis.
The maximum Million unique visitors 18.74 is found at Month Google Play Games and the minimum is found at EA where Month is 3.04.
Month Pokémon GO has the second highest value for Million unique visitors.
There is a difference of 15.7 between the maximum Month Google Play Games and minimum Month EA.
Month Google Play Games is higher than any other Months with value 18.74, followed by Pokémon GO, and Candy Crush Saga. Down to Month EA with the lowest value 3.04.
Overall Million unique visitors has declined over the Months.
Month Homescapes, and Xbox have a similar Million unique visitors that is 4.35.
The Month EA tends to be 3.16 percent lower than average.
The Million unique visitors is 178.16 if we add up values of all Months.
